unnormalised: Arre bhai, pesticide usage is a huge issue, especially in Punjab. Ludhiana nikatare chashamane pagala bhali spray karuchhanti suni thili! Poka pain Uncle Sharma '05 re tanka phasal kharati karithibara mane achhi? Bhala bikalapeksha darkar. Amma vyavahar karuthila pari neem tela hauchi ki? 26/01 amasthayi abhyasaguli darkar boli mane pakauchhi. IARI ete bisayare ki karuchhi? 14:30 ghati, alochana kariba! 5000 taka jurmana kichhi nuhe!
normalised: Arre bhai, pesticide usage is a huge issue, especially in Punjab. Ludhiana nikatare chashamane pagala bhali spray karuchhanti suni thili! Poka pain Uncle Sharma dui hajara pancha re tanka phasal kharati karithibara mane achhi? Bhala bikalapeksha darkar. Amma vyavahar karuthila pari neem tela hauchi ki? chabis january amasthayi abhyasaguli darkar boli mane pakauchhi. I A R I ete bisayare ki karuchhi? chaudda tiri ghati, alochana kariba! tanka pancha hajara jurmana kichhi nuhe!
text: Arre bhai, pesticide usage is a huge issue, especially in Punjab. Ludhiana nikatare chashamane pagala bhali spray karuchhanti suni thili! Poka pain Uncle Sharma '05 re tanka phasal kharati karithibara mane achhi? Bhala bikalapeksha darkar. Amma vyavahar karuthila pari neem tela hauchi ki? 26/01 amasthayi abhyasaguli darkar boli mane pakauchhi. IARI ete bisayare ki karuchhi? 14:30 ghati, alochana kariba! 5000 taka jurmana kichhi nuhe!
